.class public auto ansi sealed HedgedTaskProvider extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Function HedgedTaskProvider(args As HedgingTaskProviderArguments, ByRef result As Task) As Boolean
type HedgedTaskProvider = delegate of HedgingTaskProviderArguments * Task -> bool
public delegate bool HedgedTaskProvider(HedgingTaskProviderArguments args, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] Task ^ % result);

Docs.param: Arguments for the hedged task provider. See .
Hedged task created by the provider. if the task was not created.
Docs.summary: A delegate used by the hedging policy to determine whether the next hedged task can be created.
Docs.returns: if a hedged task is created, otherwise.
